Function reference

Fitting

Description for these functions

eglasso()
Fitting extremal graphical lasso
emst()
Fitting extremal minimum spanning tree
fmpareto_graph_HR()
Parameter fitting for multivariate Huesler--Reiss Pareto distributions on block graphs
fmpareto_graph_HR_general()
Parameter fitting for multivariate Huesler--Reiss Pareto distributions on non-decomposable graphs
fmpareto_graph_HR_decomposable()
Parameter fitting for multivariate Huesler--Reiss Pareto distributions on decomposable graphs
emp_chi()
Empirical estimation of extremal correlation matrix \(\chi\)
emp_vario()
Estimation of the variogram matrix \(\Gamma\) of the Huesler--Reiss distribution
emp_chi_multdim()
Empirical estimation of extremal correlation \(\chi\)
loglik_HR()
Compute Huesler--Reiss log-likelihood, AIC, and BIC

Completion

complete_Gamma()
Completion of Gamma matrices
complete_Gamma_decomposable()
Completion of decomposable Gamma matrices
complete_Gamma_general()
Completion of non-decomposable Gamma matrices
complete_Gamma_one_step()
Completion of two-clique decomposable Gamma matrices

Simulation

rmpareto()
Sampling of a multivariate Pareto distribution
rmpareto_tree()
Sampling of a multivariate Pareto distribution on a tree
rmstable()
Sampling of a multivariate max-stable distribution
rmstable_tree()
Sampling of a multivariate max-stable distribution on a tree

Transformation

Gamma2Sigma()
Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to \(\Sigma^{(k)}\) matrix
Gamma2Theta()
Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to \(\Theta\) matrix
Gamma2chi()
Transformation of the Huesler--Reiss variogram \(\Gamma\) to extremal correlation \(\chi\)
Gamma2graph()
Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to graph object
Sigma2Gamma()
Transformation of \(\Sigma^{(k)}\) matrix to \(\Gamma\) matrix
Theta2Gamma()
Transformation of \(\Gamma\) matrix to \(\Theta\) matrix
chi2Gamma()
Transformation of extremal correlation \(\chi\) to the Huesler--Reiss variogram \(\Gamma\)
data2mpareto()
Data standardization to multivariate Pareto scale
emtp2()
Performs Gaussian likelihood optimization under Laplacian matrix constraints.

Generate Examples

generate_random_chordal_graph()
Generate a random chordal graph
generate_random_connected_graph()
Generate a random connected graph
generate_random_graphical_Gamma()
Generate a random Gamma matrix for a given graph
generate_random_integer_Gamma()
Generate a random Gamma matrix containing only integers
generate_random_model()
Generate random Hüsler--Reiss Models
generate_random_spd_matrix()
Generate a random symmetric positive definite matrix
generate_random_tree()
Generate a random tree

Datasets

danube
Upper Danube basin dataset.
flights
Flights delay data.

Others

check_graph()
Check input graph
check_Gamma_and_graph()
Check input graph and Gamma matrix
eglearn()
Learning extremal graph structure
graphicalExtremes
graphicalExtremes: Statistical methodology for graphical extreme value models.
is_block_graph()
Check if a graph is a block graph
order_cliques()
Order Cliques
pruefer_to_graph()
Convert a Pruefer sequence to a graph
Zmatrix()
Computes the Z-matrix
